lead: AI continues to evolve and integrate into various sectors, from enterprise solutions to consumer applications, reshaping interactions and workflows.

stories.title: Which AI chatbots have ads? Comparing ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and more
stories.summary: A recent comparison of popular AI chatbots reveals which ones incorporate advertisements and their respective plans for future ad rollouts. The analysis covers ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and others, providing insights into how these platforms monetize their services and what users can expect moving forward.

stories.title: Sapiom raises $15M to help AI agents buy their own tech tools
stories.summary: Sapiom has secured $15 million in funding to develop a financial layer that enables AI agents to autonomously purchase necessary technology tools. This innovation aims to streamline operations and enhance the efficiency of AI agents in various sectors.

stories.title: Reddit looks to AI search as its next big opportunity
stories.summary: Reddit is exploring the integration of AI search capabilities to enhance user experience and engagement. This move is part of a broader strategy to capitalize on the growing demand for AI-driven solutions in content discovery and community interaction.

stories.title: OpenAI launches a way for enterprises to build and manage AI agents
stories.summary: OpenAI has introduced Frontier, a platform designed for enterprises to create and manage AI agents. This initiative aims to treat AI agents as human employees, enhancing operational efficiency and decision-making within organizations.

stories.title: AI companies want you to stop chatting with bots and start managing them
stories.summary: A shift in focus is emerging within the AI industry, encouraging users to transition from interacting with chatbots to managing AI agents. This paradigm shift highlights the potential for AI to take on more complex tasks and responsibilities.

stories.title: How AI agents will redefine procurement in 2026
stories.summary: AI agents are set to transform procurement processes by automating routine tasks and enhancing decision-making capabilities. This evolution reflects a broader trend of integrating AI into business operations to improve efficiency and resilience.

stories.title: OpenAI's Frontier wants to manage your AI agents - it could upend enterprise software, too
stories.summary: OpenAI's Frontier platform offers a new approach to managing AI agents, potentially disrupting traditional enterprise software models. By emulating successful frameworks, Frontier aims to enhance the deployment and oversight of AI technologies in business.

stories.title: AI-generated ads could dominate Super Bowl LX
stories.summary: As Super Bowl LX approaches, AI-generated advertisements are expected to take center stage, showcasing the growing influence of AI in marketing. With companies like Anthropic and OpenAI participating, the event may highlight the capabilities of AI in creative advertising.
